guide: Hello, I'm Language Feed bot. I am here to help you to learn English through diving into your favorite content! I will send it to you every day for continuous practice. So now, to get started - choose the topics that you would like to see! You can always find out the translation of a new word by typing it in the chat!
set_preferences: Set your content preferences to start your feed
finish_setting_preferences: Finish setting preferences and get your first feed
feed_for_today_thing: This is your feed for today
choose_your_preferences: Choose what type of content you like to look at it more closely
do_you_like_this_type_of_content: Press the like button if you like this type of content
you_do_like_this_type_of_content: You liked this type of content
final_message: Thank you for using Language Feed! This is your last, and seventh feed! Please, share your feedback with us!
